issue.title: [GLib] Add support for decimal compare operators
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4175](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4175). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`garrow_decimal128_not_equal()` for `!=`, `garrow_decimal128_less_than()` for `<`, `garrow_decimal128_less_than_or_equal()` for `<=` and so on.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4175?focusedCommentId=16735442) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
`[~shiro615]` Can you work on this?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4175?focusedCommentId=16735481) by Yosuke Shiro (shiro615):*
Yes! I'll try to work on this today.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4175?focusedCommentId=16737683) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3346
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3346>
